skill.name: The Price of Kindness
skill.value: Deals 4229/5049 DMG to the enemy with the most HP, with a high/very high chance of inflicting Virulent Poison.

ability.name: Demonic Lure (Lv. 45)
ability.value: Normal attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Poison.

ability.name: Faust's Pact (Lv. 90)
ability.value: Recovers a portion of DMG dealt as HP.
